text: The iPhone 16e is a smartphone developed by Apple Inc. It was announced on February 19, 2025, people can buy early on February 21, 2025. launched in order to replace the iPhone SE. It was released on February 28, 2025. as the new iPhone currently available on the market. It has a USB-C charger port instead of Lightning, main reason why it was launched as a replacement for the iPhone SE, since the new European Union rules requires all devices sold on its market to use the USB-C connector. Other of its characteristics are a 6.1 inch OLED screen featuring the same notch for Face ID seen on iPhone 13, iPhone 13 Pro and iPhone 14, NFC, Apple A18 Bionic chipset and C1 modem, also developed by Apple. The iPhone 16e comes with iOS 18.3 installed by default, and new future iOS updates can be installed just like on the rest of the iPhone models. The iPhone 16e became the cheapest iPhone 16 family to works with Apple Intelligence. It is the first budget iPhone to have USB-C and Face ID. == Hardware == The iPhone 16e has 6.1 inch 460ppi OLED screen, NFC, 48MP wide rear camera, 12MP wide front camera, Apple A18 Bionic chipset, 8GB RAM, 128GB, 256GB and 512GB storage, Apple C1 modem, Face ID, 4K 24fps, 25fps, 30fps, 60fps and 1080p 25fps, 30fps, 60fps, 120fps, 240fps rear video recording camera, 4K 24fps, 25fps, 30fps, 60fps and 1080p 25fps, 30fps, 60fps, 120fps front video recording camera. == Software == The iPhone 16e run iOS 18.3 for the first time, and its works with the Apple Intelligence feature that allows users to use AI, making it first budget iPhone works with Apple Intelligence. == Design == The iPhone 16e has a screen design just like a iPhone 13, iPhone 13 Pro and iPhone 14. It has a two colors black and white, The Product Red color option has been removed. == Related pages == *iPhone 16 *iPhone 16 Pro == References == == Other websites == * Category:Mobile phones with 4K video recording Category:IPhone Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2025
title: IPhone 16e
